citeinfo.origin: National Ocean Survey (NOA), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
citeinfo.title: Monthly and Annual Mean Sea Surface Temperature and Density for the Eastern and Southern Pacific Ocean (1872-1969)

abstract.p: Publication Title: Surface Water Temperature and Density: Pacific Coast, North and South America and Pacific Ocean Islands.

Includes summaries of sea water temperatures and densities at locations along the Pacific coast through the year 1969. Tables contain monthly means and annual means and extremes of the surface water temperatures and densities for each year of observation after 1964; earlier observations are combined in 5-year groups. Graphs of mean temperature and density curves are presented. Includes stations in the United States, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Colombia, El Salvador, Mexico, Philippine Islands, Guatemala, Marshall Islands, Solomon Islands, Marianas, Panama, Samoa, Costa Rica and Caroline Islands.
Available from the NOAA Library System: URL http://www.lib.noaa.gov/.

descript.purpose: This publication is in the National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by NOAA from many nations over the years.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
